validation.min: The field must be greater than or equal to __min__
validation.max: The field must be less than or equal to __max__
validation.range: The field must be between __min__ and __max__
validation.minLength: The field must be at least __minLength__ characters
validation.maxLength: The field must be at most __maxLength__ characters
validation.rangeLength: The field must be between __min__ and  __max__ characters
validation.oneOf: The field must be one of: __oneOf__
validation.digits: The field must only contain digits
validation.number: The field must be a number
validation.email: The field must be a valid email
validation.url: The field must be a valid url
